# About Me

I'm a High School student from the United States pursuing a career in software engineering.

I’m what is considered a “self-taught” programmer. I’m not a professional just yet I’m still early on in my journey. I like to work or learn about anything I deem to be interesting. For example, Roblox Game Development, Web Development, and Software Automation.

I enjoy playing video games every now and again, going out with friends, and especially listening to music. My music taste varies a lot, so uh according to my stats.fm, my top 3 artists are: Tyler The Creator, Mac DeMarco, and Kendrick Lamar though Sweatcult lowk so peak....
